Describe this season with one champion

{{champion:104}}
Oh wow. There's actually someone that remembered gp with the tri force changes. I made a thread about this but with the all the dq stuff no one gave a fk
welp, back to Statik Shiv/IE I guess..

Back? 
The most common build has always been the 100% crit build with TF/IE/SHIV/PD....

Again, reading really helps understand my point here. 

I said **RUSHING** statik Shiv/IE.

Now that  Trinity Force no longer gives Crit Chance, GP players will go back to **RUSHING** Shiv/IE rather than {{item:3078}} + crit item.


I know its really hard, reading all those words. Not to mention analysing their meaning before actually jumping to a conclusion, but at least give it a try, fam.

Well that fucking Zed and Fizz made my day.

I was in spectator and I saw a team rage about {{champion:420}}. Their team had {{champion:64}}, {{champion:89}} and {{champion:80}}.

Well duh, you have three champs (two of which don't have great scaling) engage her in the midgame. How would you expect her to respond?

{{champion:420}} said it herself: "This ends one of two ways - they run, or I break them."

Just pick a team that can kite her already.
This was hilarious.
So whats going on with {{champion:245}} ? I come back after 4 months and everybody is losing their minds.
He's still not supposed to be a juggernaut.
people build him tank and ruin him for the fans of him basically
